He was previously the Head of Marketing at CDN77 which became one of the fastest growing European B2B startups.Michal also provides SEO and marketing consulting for SaaS companies as a side gig.Aside from diverse hands-on experience, Michal learned the most about marketing by completing semestral courses about marketing and brand management taught by Mark Ritson–probably the most respected and famous marketing professor.
